# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/containers.py
@source-hash: 73fe7a4f171e7466
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:00:01Z

**Primary Purpose**: Container classes for the Rich library that aggregate and render multiple console elements. Part of the Rich text rendering system for Python terminals.

## Core Components

### Renderables Class (L30-64)
A container for multiple renderable objects that can be displayed together.

**Key Methods:**
- `__init__` (L33-38): Accepts optional iterable of RenderableType objects
- `__rich_console__` (L40-44): Renders all contained renderables sequentially 
- `__rich_measure__` (L46-57): Calculates combined minimum/maximum dimensions across all renderables
- `append` (L59-60): Adds new renderable to collection

**Architecture**: Implements Rich's rendering protocol via `__rich_console__` and `__rich_measure__` methods.

### Lines Class (L66-167) 
A specialized container for Text objects with advanced text layout capabilities.

**Key Methods:**
- `__init__` (L69-70): Accepts iterable of Text objects
- List-like interface: `__getitem__` (L78-87), `__setitem__` (L89-91), `__len__` (L93-94)
- `__rich_console__` (L96-100): Renders each line sequentially
- `justify` (L111-167): Complex text justification algorithm supporting left/center/right/full alignment

**Text Justification Algorithm (L111-167):**
- **Left** (L129-131): Truncates to width with padding
- **Center** (L132-137): Centers text within available width
- **Right** (L138-142): Right-aligns text
- **Full** (L143-167): Distributes spaces evenly between words (excluding last line)

## Dependencies
- `itertools.zip_longest` for full justification spacing
- `.cells.cell_len` for text width calculation
- `.measure.Measurement` for dimension calculations
- Rich console types (Console, ConsoleOptions, etc.) via TYPE_CHECKING

## Architectural Patterns
- **Rich Protocol Compliance**: Both classes implement `__rich_console__` for rendering
- **Container Abstraction**: Wraps collections with console-aware rendering behavior
- **Type Safety**: Extensive use of forward references and TYPE_CHECKING for circular import avoidance

## Critical Constraints
- Renderables class returns Measurement(1, 1) for empty collections (L54)
- Full justification skips the last line (L145-146)
- Text width calculations depend on cell_len for proper unicode/emoji handling
